result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lucas Jon Ische

records.addlTxt:
10:40 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Lucas Jon Ische in court.  Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson appeared by video for Lucas Jon Ische.  Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG. Atty Harrelson not requesting speedy trial at this time. Court schedules PSC in December.  DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 11:52 AM. bph
Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for December 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin. S/T of Deputy Joshua Stenseth.  Direct by ADA Smestad. Cross by Atty Harrelson. Redirect by ADA Smestad. Court questions Deputy. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Court schedules ARGN. DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 11:47 AM
Arraignment scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 11:45 am.

Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Harrelson states there is an offer he received but no discovery, asking to schedule a PH, DE is on a hold for a different matter will be released on 9/14/22.  DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 9:30 AM. bph
